GR13cakbhavu:7_1: avācyavācakam avarṇanirvarṇanam anādyanantam antarbahīrūpam apūjyapūjakam api prasaradādyodyantṛtāvatārakramāvatāritapañcavāhaprapañcamayākṛtrimapūjyapūjanakakrameṇa
GR13cakbhavu:11: tām eva bhaṭṭārakapādāḥ stotramukhena prakaṭayanta ādiślokena āsūtrayanti
GR13cakbhavu:14: Viv: bhavāya helāmātrodbhāvitabhavābhavāya namaḥ / nama iti namaḥśabdagatavarṇadvayavityāsena (?)
GR13cakbhavu:16: tena tatra mano vilāpayāmīty arthaḥ / kāladehaṃ vā kālavikalpanollāsikāmīhaṃ vā sūryakalājālena dvādaśātmakamarīcicayena yo 'paharatīti tacchīlo 'yam akramapadena darśitaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:17: sūrīnāmakalājālena madhyamadhāmānuvedhena bhāvābhāvabhūmyullaṅghanātmanā kāladehāpahārī mahāhaṅkārātmakamahākāladeham apahartuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ / tad uktaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:19: ityādi / tataś ca sūryakalājālena vā sūryakalājālam eva vā kāladeham apaharatīty alaṃgrāsamahaughaḥ prakaṭitaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:20: na hy akramānākhyaparaciccakreśvarīsamudaye kālo nāma kaścid upapadyate / tad uktaṃ mayaivākramakallolakārikāsu
GR13cakbhavu:21: Q: kālaḥ kālena kālyaś cet & kālaḥ kālyeta kena vā
GR13cakbhavu:22: akālya eva kālaś cet & kālya eva tathāḷna kim
GR13cakbhavu:26_1: iti tu pāṭhe ādhāre dhyeyā śaktir eva tadadhiṣṭhānena sādhiṣṭhānatvāt pīṭho yasya tasmai bhavāya,
GR13cakbhavu:27_0: abhavadāyine 'śivaparikhaṇḍanāya mokṣapradāya vā nama ity anena kāladehāpahāriṇādhārādheyapīṭhatvapratipādanena
GR13cakbhavu:27_1: sarvātmasātkaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ satatodito 'kṛtrimapūjānaya uṭṭaṅkitaḥ / atrāpahāripadena saṃhāra uktaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:30: ity akramaughaḥ sṛṣṭiparyavasānenānena ślokena carcitaḥ / caturthasya sakalakramākramabhittibhūtatvāt pṛthag anabhidhānam eva /
GR13cakbhavu:35_0: avyaktā bhavābhavasthitiprādhānyād uṭṭaṅkatvenāprakaṭitā mūrtir yasya tasmai śivāya
GR13cakbhavu:35_1: mahatyāveśe 'py aparibhraṃśaśīlāya / nama iti vyākhyātam / śiśutayādyā bhedasvabhāvena
GR13cakbhavu:35_2: sthitā yeyaṃ niśākāntasya kālarātrīramaṇasya parabhairavasya kalanāt kalā saivāghoraghorāghorātighorāvaraṇatrayopetavargāṣṭakadalalālitā,
GR13cakbhavu:36: saiva kamalaṃ tanmāline tadādhārāya tadādheyāya vā / niśākāntakalā saṃhāradevī, tathā cāsmatputraḥ
GR13cakbhavu:38: Q: kṛśatayā kraśimavyapalāpinī & jayati kāpi kalā vigatakramā
GR13cakbhavu:41: Q: krīḍaty ātmamayair bhāvair & bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva //
GR13cakbhavu:44: iti / \pratika{māline} dhāriṇe iti sthitiḥ / \pratika{ānandadehāya} iti sṛṣṭis tasyā ānandarūpatvāt,
GR13cakbhavu:45: \pratika{avyaktamūrtaye} iti saṃhāraḥ / ayam api satatasiddha eva pūjākramaḥ //
GR13cakbhavu:50: pāśānām -- āṇavamāyīyakārmikāṇām malānām oghaḥ tasya saṃghaṭṭa ahetukena kenāpi krameṇa ullāsaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:51: tena vā tatra vā tasya vā yo 'yaṃ layaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:52_0: tathā viśleṣaḥ pṛthagbhāvas tatkaraṇaśīlatvena vartamānāya sadā tritayakāritvān nāntarīyakaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:52_2: gurvāmnāyaḥ -- mantrā varṇarūpā garbhe yasyāḥ sā mālinī mantragarbhā tadantargatā
GR13cakbhavu:52_3: tasyā udare vācyatvenābhyantare tiṣṭhatīti sa tathā,
GR13cakbhavu:53: athavā mantrāṇāṃ garbho mantragarbhaḥ prathamasvaras tasyodaram uttarapakṣapratikṣepeṇa madhyamakalā tuṭyardharūpā tatra sthitā,
GR13cakbhavu:54: athavā mananatrāṇadharmitvān marīciṣu sthityuditāsu mantra ityādirūpatayā yo 'yam anārāvarāvo rāvasaṃghaṭṭakatayā
GR13cakbhavu:58: ityādyasmadviracitākulakaulikātriṃśikoktasvarūpas tasya garbhaṃ gahanam avaṭarūpaṃ tadudare tadgamanikāgamye dhāmni tiṣṭhatīti sa tathoktaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:59: sarvatra cātrādyabhaṭṭārakopadeśa eva virājate tasyaiva paramātmatvāt,
GR13cakbhavu:60: ata evātra bhavaśivaharaśabdaiḥ ślokatrayoditasṛṣṭyādyupadeśacaramasyānākhyasya sarvāntaścāritvam avāggocaratvāt sūcitam eva / atraughasaṃghaṭṭaśabdābhyāṃ sṛṣṭisthityoḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:61: haraśabdena saṃhārasya dyotane 'kṛtakā kāpi pūjā nirūpitaiva //3
GR13cakbhavu:62_1: śambhor nirguṇasyānantaguṇasya vopacārair anantair bāhyair vā kāyikair vācikair mānasair
GR13cakbhavu:62_2: vā pūjayitum aśakyatvāt ko 'yaṃ bhāvopahāro nāma ity āśaṅkyāha
GR13cakbhavu:63: CakBhst_4ab: yadyapi tvaṃ guṇātīto vākpater apy agocaraḥ
GR13cakbhavu:64: CakBhst_4cd: tathāpy ā hṛdayāt stotum udyatā vāk sadā mama
GR13cakbhavu:66: CakBhst_5cd: tvatpreritā yato nātha nāparādho 'sti me kvacit
GR13cakbhavu:68: yadyapitathāpiśabdābhyām anupapattāv apy upapattiṃ prakāśayadbhyām anupapattir eva sarvopapattir iti kāpi yuktir uktā,
GR13cakbhavu:69: tathā hi guṇātīto 'pi tasyaiva viṣayo 'pi tadullāsitena kenāpi durghaṭaghaṭanānayenārvācīnabhūmimūrtitvena viṣayadhāma aśnute / tad uktaṃ tapasviprabodhanāthena
GR13cakbhavu:70: Q: parataratayāpi rūpaṃ & yad yat kalayāmi tat tad adharaṃ te
GR13cakbhavu:71: Q: adharatarāpi na kalanā & sā kācid yatra na sthitāsy abhitaḥ /iti
GR13cakbhavu:72: ā hṛdayād ā paradhāmnaḥ paśyantyādirūpeṇa sadoditāpi vaikharyātmanā tvayaivaitenādyabhaṭṭārakena prakarṣeṇeritā satī prasarati,
GR13cakbhavu:73: iti mam na kaś caid aparādha ity ahaṃ tatsamāveśita evoditaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:74: yady ahaṃ nāma kaś cid anyo bhaveyaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:76: yadi param aparādho 'py aham api bhavān apy ekam eva tattvaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:77: tataś ca ko 'parādhaśabdārthaḥ / tad uktaṃḷmayaiva śivaravastotre
GR13cakbhavu:79: Q: candravimalamukuṭena nutāv & anumoditā mama matiḥ pravartate / iti
GR13cakbhavu:80_0: atikrāntā bhaktirasāvibhāgabhūmir yena tādṛg yo 'yam āveśaḥ sarvatodikkatanmayatodayas
GR13cakbhavu:80_1: tena vivaśā viśiṣṭā vaśeva kareṇur iva nijabodharasacarvaṇasadāvaraṇanirāvaraṇamadavighūrṇitatvād
GR13cakbhavu:80_2: viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya sa tathā,
GR13cakbhavu:81_0: ity anenaitad uktaṃ bhavati---na tad vācyaṃ kṛtyaṃ vā kiṃcana yat tvatparicarvaṇacārurūpatayā
GR13cakbhavu:81_1: na cakāsti / tataś ca suptapralāpagālidānādibhir api tvam eva stūyase ity āha viśvato
GR13cakbhavu:81_2: mukha iti visvata ā mukhaṃ yasyeti vā / paśukukkuṭādimūrtiparyantam asyāvirbhūtatvam
GR13cakbhavu:81_3: abādhyam ity arthaḥ / sarvathāpy anuditān astamitāparimitacidekaghanam iti pratipāditam //4--5 //
GR13cakbhavu:83: CakBhst_6cd: gṛhāṇa mattaḥ śrīkaṇṭha ! bhāvapūjām akṛtrimām
GR13cakbhavu:84: Viv: śrīr viśvavaicitryaśobhodhāvinī śaktiḥ kaṇṭhe 'vibhāgadhāmni yasya tasyāmantraṇaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:85_0: `gṛhāṇa' iti saṃpradānasaṃpradeyatayā tvam eva sphurasīti yāñcārthā akṛtktrimaśabdena
GR13cakbhavu:85_1: sūcitā / tava pādāḥ piṇḍasthādibhedena catasro 'vasthās tā evābjaṃ tatra tadullāsitajñeyakāryavastu vikalparūpaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:86_0: rañjanād rajas tena pūtā tato vā pūtā sadyuktiparipavanena kṣapitā yā citābhūtiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:86_1: sarvasaṃkṣayaparacidrūpā sarvodbhūtirūpā vā tayā viśiṣṭāyāṃ bhuvy uṣitāt prastoṣyamāṇān
GR13cakbhavu:86_2: matto mama sakāśāt tvam api matto nijānandanirbharo bhāvapūjām ātasātkaroṣīti //6 //
GR13cakbhavu:90: Viv: hṛtpuṣkaraṃ hṛtpadmaṃ tatra baddhalakṣyatayā snātvā sakalamalavidhūnananaṃ vidhāya,
GR13cakbhavu:92: etad eva hṛtpuṣkaraṃ tīrthaṃ sarvacakrāṇāṃ tatraiva paramaviśrāntilābhāt,
GR13cakbhavu:94: samyag bodhaḥ saṃbodhas tad eva dhautaṃ sakalakālikāviśuddhaṃ vasanam aśeṣācchādakatayā vartamānam yasya,
GR13cakbhavu:96: śyāmakaṇṭhaḥ sarvaghaṭṭakamahātamisrārūpasaṃkalanadhāmātmikā śyāmā kaṇṭhe gale yasya / yathoktam
GR13cakbhavu:98: Q: pralayotsavasarabhasayā & dṛḍham upagūḍhaṃ śivaṃ vande [Utp. Stotrāvalī 16.19--21]
GR13cakbhavu:104: prabhau vyāpake bhairavadhāmny ūtāny anusyūtāni yāni bhūtāni pañcātmakaśaktivivartabhūtāni pṛthivyādīni,
GR13cakbhavu:108: CakBhst_9cd: tat tad dvārādhipakulaṃ tava pūjyaṃ manasvibhiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:109: Viv: bāhyaviṣayākṣepakatvān manonmanālakṣaṇaṃ dvāraṃ tadvāsi kulaṃ dvāḥsthakulaṃ dvāḥsthasamūhaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:110: vikalparasā eva hi svarūparasāveśadravaṇenāsamvibhaktā bāhyakaṣyāsu kṣipanti,
GR13cakbhavu:111: tad anu caivaṃ mānitās te svarūpanarapatisamīpam arpayanti,
GR13cakbhavu:117: tathā suṣṭhu ūraṇād iti candraśabdena sūryaśabdena ca jāgratsvapnayor grahaṇam,
GR13cakbhavu:120: unmukte guuptasauṣuptamaṇḍale guptaṃ tirohitaṃ sauṣuptaṃ maṇḍalaṃ yatra tasmin turīye dhāmni,
GR13cakbhavu:121: nagajā avicalakūṭasthadhāmasamullasitā śaktiḥ tasyāḥ kānta viśrāntadhāman,
GR13cakbhavu:126_1: nirviśeṣeṇa phalarūpam āsanam upalakṣaṇatayā tasyāpi sāpekṣatvāt tad apy ullaṅghitavato
GR13cakbhavu:127: te nivedyata iti pāṭhe nivedyate niḥśeṣeṇa vedyate tadbhāvenānubhūyate,
GR13cakbhavu:137: CakBhst_13cd: kaḥ karoti budhaḥ sthāṇor āhvānādivisarjanam
GR13cakbhavu:139: sthāṇor sthāsnor apracalitasarvagatacinmātravapuṣaḥ pṛthag digdeśakālaparigaṇanakalpanābhāvād āhvānopakramaṃ visarjanam avagatatattvah kaḥ karoti,
GR13cakbhavu:140: vyatiriktadeśakālasaṃbhave hi kasya cid ānayanaṃ kutra cit prahāṇaṃ saṃbhāvyeta,
GR13cakbhavu:141: iha tu sarvasyaiva tanmayatvāt kasyāhvānaṃ kuta āhvānaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:142: kasya visarjanaṃ kutra ca visarjanam iti tatsamāveśenaiva sarvasaṃsaktir uktā //13//
GR13cakbhavu:145: Viv: abhyajyate 'nabhivyaktam aoi vyaktim ānīyate sṛṣṭikramāvadyotitā yena so 'bhaṅga upasnehakaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:148: CakBhst_15cd: niḥsnehatvaṃ prabhutvaṃ ca rūkṣam udvartanaṃ tava
GR13cakbhavu:150: indriyeṣu rāgalobhānuyāyiṣu satsv iti vyadhikaraṇe saptamyau,
GR13cakbhavu:151: niḥsnehatvaṃ prabhutvaṃ cātyantāyuktir anabhiṣvaṅgas tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvena vā sphuraṇam
GR13cakbhavu:152: Q: buddhavat sarvarāgī syāt & sarvadveṣyo 'tha bhairavaḥ
GR13cakbhavu:157: mahānādādyakalāvacūlāya ṣoḍaśasvararūpakalākalāpārambhādyavarṇarūpaśiroṅkuśarūpayā+ anacchakalayā baindhavaṃ tīrtham ubhayaśūnyabilarūpaṃ saṃśodhya nirgranthibandhaṃ vidhāya,
GR13cakbhavu:162_0: svaprabodhaḥ svavimarśa eva+ ambaram anāvaraṇatvād vyoma ata evodāram udbhaṭaṃ vikasat
GR13cakbhavu:162_1: sarvātmatayā prasarat sollāsitakāryācchādakatayā vastraṃ tena gharṣaṇaṃ pratyāvṛttinayena
GR13cakbhavu:166: CakBhst_18cd: paramānandadaṃ me 'ntas tava pādyam anābilam
GR13cakbhavu:168_0: ubhayor api sāpekṣatvenānupapadyamānasvarūpatvāj jaḍājaḍayos triṣv api kāleṣu cidatirekeṇābhāva
GR13cakbhavu:168_1: evāgamanād avicalatvān nagaḥ tatra yo nirjharo nirgato jharo vayohānirūpaḥ kālo yasmāt
GR13cakbhavu:175_1: īṣaducchūnatayā kiṃciccalanātmakam api tad eva mandiraṃ sarvasya prathamanivāsitvād
GR13cakbhavu:175_2: amando 'navacchinna ānandaniḥṣyando 'ham ity ullekhacamatkāraprasaro yatra tādṛśaspandamandirasya
GR13cakbhavu:176: unmiṣadananyatvarasarūpam ācamanaṃ gṛhāṇa kaivalyarasam api saṃhara,
GR13cakbhavu:180: CakBhst_20cd: anarghyam arghaṃ pādebhyaḥ prayacchāmi vṛṣākape
GR13cakbhavu:182: he vṛṣa svaśaktirasavarṣanapravaṇa! tathā+ akape acapala---kūṭastha! granthipañcakam indhikā+dīpikā+rocikā+mocikā+ūrdhvagālakṣaṇaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:183: manograthanād dhāraṇā vāruṇyādyā deśabandharūpāś cittasya tā evāmbhāsi tair aṣṭottaraśatasaṃkhyātāntikamukhyasaṃpradāyasiddhibhūmikolaṅghanakrameṇa+ amalatām āsādya,
GR13cakbhavu:186: CakBhst_21cd: girīśa tisṛbhir vāgbhiḥ stutipuṣpaiḥ prapūjyase
GR13cakbhavu:188: turīyodyāne parāsvarūpakānane vikasad yad etat saṃvitsaurabhaṃ bodhāmodas tannirbharaiḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:190: tisṛbhir vāgbhiḥ pūjyase / tatra paśyantyāḥ tāvat svarūpāvyatiriktāntāsphuṭatedantāhantāvabhāsaparamasāmarasyarūpā stutiḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:201: CakBhst_23ab: anāhatā nadaty antar yā gaur dhāmni pare parā
GR13cakbhavu:202: CakBhst_23cd: sā ghaṇṭā vādyate śambhor agre granthārthagarbhiṇī
GR13cakbhavu:204: aghaṃṭasiditi troṭayati iti aghaṇṭā parā prakṛṣṭā granthārthagarbhiṇī---antaritasakalavācyavācakakalāpā //23//
GR13cakbhavu:207: Viv: kandānalāt ādhāramadhyadhāmnaḥ ullasantī śaktiśikhā bindurūpā,
GR13cakbhavu:213: sarvācchuraṇāt samālambhakaṃ vā tādṛśā eva hi mumukṣavo mucyante iti / tad uktam utpaladevapādaiḥ---
GR13cakbhavu:214: Q: yo 'vikalpam idam arthamaṇḍalaṃ & paśyatīśa nikhilaṃ bhavadvapuḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:215: Q: svātmapakṣaparipūrite jagaty & asya nityasukhinaḥ kuto bhayam // iti
GR13cakbhavu:217: CakBhst_26cd: uṣṇīṣam astu te rudra vidrāvitanabho 'rgalam
GR13cakbhavu:218: Viv: nādaśakter bindūrdhvakalāyā uditam uparigataṃ nādāntatejovyapadeśyaṃ prakāśakatvād dhāma,
GR13cakbhavu:219: tad eva avacchedahetunā āṇavādinā malatrayeṇa virahitam,
GR13cakbhavu:221: uṣaṇe vikalpaploṣaṇe īśam uṣṇīṣam iti akṣarasāmyenāpi niruktiḥ //
GR13cakbhavu:234: viśvākāśakuśeśayāt plāvakarasayuktyā akhilavigalanakrameṇa / tad uktaṃ mayā cakreśvarabhairavāṣṭake
GR13cakbhavu:236: Q: paramāṇuvatprahīṇaṃ & yatra nabhas tan numaḥ śaivam
GR13cakbhavu:237: iti śaktair arkakarair mahākālasaṃkarṣiṇīkiraṇaiś cidrūpacandrapīyūṣarasacarvaṇena cinnabhaso 'pi u .........(lacuna)
GR13cakbhavu:239: CakBhst_30ab: mantraṃ manasi tacchaktau tāṃ svadhāmni sadodite
GR13cakbhavu:240: CakBhst_30cd: kṛtvā japavidhiṃ samyak śivāya vinivedaye
GR13cakbhavu:241: Viv: ``sahasro mānasa'' iti nītyā mantram anāhatasatatoccarad akulabhaṭṭārakākāram
GR13cakbhavu:243: Q: antarjalacarāḥ satvās te 'pi nityaṃ bruvanti tam
GR13cakbhavu:245: tad api manaḥ prāptamantrasāmarasyaṃ śaktau prathanaprathamavīrye kṛtvā,
GR13cakbhavu:246: śaktim api nijamahimani nityam aparityaktasārvātmyasarvottīrṇatātirekamahodaye sarvavarṇānāṃ śaktikramasphuritatattatsvarūpānuprāṇanena svarūpalābhāt / tad uktaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:249: śivāya svātmamaheśvare tādarthyena viśeṣeṇa niravaśeṣaṃ buddhye samyak,
GR13cakbhavu:251: etat paramārthatāyām api nirvīryabījatayā na samyaksiddhisādhanabhāvam aśnuta ity uktaṃ bhavati //30//
GR13cakbhavu:253: CakBhst_31cd: anābilaṃ parāṃ vyāptiṃ mudrāṃ badhnāmi dhūrjaṭe
GR13cakbhavu:257_0: ṭīkate sarvatra iti āgūritākramacatuṣṭayārtho dhūrjaṭiḥ / etāṃ layodayamudrām ekām
GR13cakbhavu:257_1: api pañcadhā vakṣyamāṇanayena sphurantīṃ badhnāmy ātmasātkaromi / akhilārthaparihāre
GR13cakbhavu:259: akṛtrimamahāvyāptimayīm / iyam eva cāntarlakṣyabahirdṛṣṭibhāvena tyāgagrahābhyāṃ bhairavī,
GR13cakbhavu:263_1: ity etallakṣaṇalakṣitatayaiva sarvamudrîṇîm iyam ekaiva pañcadhî prasarantī tattadvacanabhedaiś carvyate ca //31 //
GR13cakbhavu:264: CakBhst_32ab: śaṣkulīkarṇayor baddhvā yo rāvo 'tra vijṛmbhate
GR13cakbhavu:265: CakBhst_32cd: tadgītam atha te vādyam ādyasaṃpuṭaghaṭṭanāt
GR13cakbhavu:266: Viv: śrotrapuṭikayor yo 'ntarninadann iva sāmānyasvarūpo yo 'sau,
GR13cakbhavu:268_1: vādyabhāvam bhajate / ``śaṣkulīkarṇayor antar'' iti vā pāṭhaḥ --- golakatacchaktyor
GR13cakbhavu:268_2: antar ityarthaḥ / gopya iti pāṭhe bhagavata āmantraṇaṃ svaprakāsatvās ananyaprakāsya! ityarthaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:269: śaṣkulīkarṇayor ādyasaṃpuṭaghaṭṭanād yo rāvas tad gītam iti anvīyate //32//
GR13cakbhavu:271: CakBhst_33cd: mantrādhvani nadāmy antaḥ kim u bāhyārthabhāvanaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:277: niṣkriyo nijamarīcinartakīr & nartayāmi paranṛttadaiśikaḥ // [Śivarātrivicāravārtika of Ramyadeva]
GR13cakbhavu:280: nadāmi cidbhairavaikaghanatāpramodena garjāmi / kiṃ varākair bāhyaviṣayavikalpātaṅkaiḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:281: iti pararasaparitṛptimahodgāraṃ prakaṭayati ``na māmy antaḥ kim u bāhye 'tra bhauvane'' iti vā pāṭhaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:282: tatra na māmi na varte kim u bhauvane kalādāv akalānte bhuvanādhvanītyarthaḥ //33//
GR13cakbhavu:284: CakBhst_34cd: upariṣṭān mayā śambhor vitānam upakalpitam
GR13cakbhavu:285: Viv: vitanoti sarvaṃ vitanyate vā sarvatra iti vitānam //34//
GR13cakbhavu:287: CakBhst_35cd: dhāryate dhūrjaṭer agre cārucāmaravan mayā
GR13cakbhavu:291: CakBhst_36cd: tālavṛntair iva vibho vījyase haṃsamārutaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:296: CakBhst_37cd: ātapatram athāsmābhir & dhāryate te mahāśaya
GR13cakbhavu:307: nāgaḥ śarīraḥ pavanaviśeṣas tasya vallī prathamaprāṇodbhedaśaktiḥ tatsaṃpattikāsundaram,
GR13cakbhavu:310: CakBhst_40cd: advaitāgnau juhomy antaḥ & śāṃkare sreyasām nidhau
GR13cakbhavu:315_3: paraḥ śivaḥ'' iti dṛśā unmanāsrucaṃ parigṛhya pūrṇāṃ juhomi,
GR13cakbhavu:316: iti saṃkṣayapradhānāyām api vṛttāv aviluptam eva pāripūrṇyam---iti pūrnakṛśadevataikātmyamayah ko 'pi nayaḥ prathitaḥ / uktaṃ ca mayaivākulakālikātriṃśikāyāṃ---
GR13cakbhavu:317: Q: svānandatas tribhuvanaṃ kavalaṃ vidhāya & svātmānam apy atitarāṃ samadā grasantī
GR13cakbhavu:322: Viv: bāhyavyāvṛttivigamapūrvakam antarmananam anantatayā sphuraṇam antarmānaṃ tadvidhau,
GR13cakbhavu:324: cittam eva cintāmaṇir bhavatsamāveśena tadvad eva saṃkalpamātreṇa sarvasamullāsāt //42//
GR13cakbhavu:327: Viv: prāṇā eva teṣāṃ vā sarvasvam āṇavaṃ svarūpaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:328_1: niḥśeṣato vedayāmi / mokṣalakṣmyā bhavaunmukhyaparāvṛttāyāḥ saṃviddevyāḥ karāmbhasi
GR13cakbhavu:328_2: paramavīciniḥṣyande jātaṃ yat pātram pātatrāṇātmakam aviluptam avadhānaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:330_1: yad eva ``namaḥ sūryakalā'' ityādinā prakrāntaṃ tad eva paryavasitam //43 //
GR13cakbhavu:331: CakBhst_44ab: saṃsāravāridheḥ santaḥ & paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥ
GR13cakbhavu:333: Viv: śrayantv avadhānena sevantāṃ, bhāvapūjāmayaṃ taraṇḍakaṃ potam //44//
GR13cakbhavu:335: CakBhst_45cd: śreyas tena jagat kṛtsnaṃ & dveṣadoṣād vimucyatām
GR13cakbhavu:338: niyatadarśanahevākitā hi sarvodayaviśrāmabhūmibhūtaparatattvaparikhaṇḍanatvāmastvāt sarvasyaiva paraḥ prakāraḥ / tad uktam mayā kṛtāntatāntiśāntistave---
GR13cakbhavu:340: māyeyaṃ bahurūpatām upagatā nānā yathā te vibho & vidyāpy evam anantabhedagahanā no cet kathaṃ syād idam /
GR13cakbhavu:342: naiḥsvābhāvyagamena ke cana pare vaiviktyataḥ ke 'pi vā & sārvātmyena pare taduttaradṛśā muktāḥ pare sarvatah //
GR13cakbhavu:344: Q: yady atattvaparihārapūrvakaṃ & tattvam eṣi tad atattvam eva hi /
GR13cakbhavu:345: Q: yady atattvam atha tattvam eva vā & tattvam eva nanu tattvam īdṛśam //
GR13cakbhavu:347: CakBhst_46ab: stotraṃ gṛhāṇa parameśvara viśvasākṣin & mānāvamānamatojjhitacittavṛtteḥ
GR13cakbhavu:350: mānāvamānayoḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇayor niṣprapañcaprapañcayor mamatayojjhitā cittavṛttir yasya tadyuktā vā tyaktā cittavṛttir yena,
GR13cakbhavu:352_0: ahaṃkṛd eva vāṅghris tadyugam anāvaraṇajñānakriyārūpaṃ tasya pīṭhaṃ paramaśivarūpaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:352_2: avabodhabhūtivibhavena avaguṇṭhitā ācchāditās tanavo mitatayā sphurantaḥ sarvabhāvā yena,
GR13cakbhavu:354: kaṃ mahāsvātantryarūpam anavacchinnaṃ brahma pālayati gopayatīti nṛkapālaṃ karparaṃ tat pāṇau ekasmin udbubhūṣāmarīcilakṣaṇe mitatayā iyattayā tulitaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ //46//
GR13cakbhavu:356: CakBhst_47cd: cakre ciccakranāthasya & śambhor bhāvanutiṃ parām
GR13cakbhavu:358: ``nirastaśāstrārthavikalpajālā & devyāḥ śmaśāne karavīrakākhye'' iti dṛśā bhasmaśabdavyākhyānavarṇitasvarūpe mahāpāśupatodyāne,
GR13cakbhavu:359: bhairavāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ patir akalitaciccakreśvarātmakas tadudyāne tadūrdhvayāne sarvātiśāyini,
GR13cakbhavu:362: mahati tapasi citsamāveśamaye bhavaḥs tāpasaḥ ciccakranāthasya---
GR13cakbhavu:365: ityādinā rājānakotpaladevanirvarṇitasvarūpasya śambhoḥ śreyaḥprabhavasya bhāvena sarvabhāvaikyasamāpattisamāveśamayena nutiṃ parāṃ cakre,
GR13cakbhavu:370: stotre bhāvopahāre vivaraṇam akarod ramyadevo dvijanmā &janmādyāyāsabhaṅgapravaṇamatilasatsadrahasyopadeśaḥ //
